PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08752013-07-18CIC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to ensure that employers bear the cost of processing labour market opinions to support the hiring of Temporary Foreign Workers, since they directly benefit from the service, and to enable the Government of Canada to more accurately recover the cost of administering the labour market opinions portion of the Temporary Foreign Workers Program by establishing a fee for their processing.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0149 Publication Date: 2013-07-31
AttachmentsAttachment
